namespace AsyncGenerator.Tests.AnonymousFunctions.Input
{
	public partial class VoidTryCatch
	{
		public Task TestAsync()
		{
			try
			{
				Runner.RunGeneric(() =>
				{
					try
					{
						SimpleFile.Clear();
						return SimpleFile.WriteAsync("");
					}
					catch (Exception ex)
					{
						return Task.FromException<bool>(ex);
					}
				});
				return Task.CompletedTask;
			}
			catch (Exception ex)

		}
